name: Meat N' Others - Culinary Pixels
description:
Usage

You are free to use this tileset on any of your projects. You are not required to mention me anywhere or anything like that. You are free to use this on commercial projects or just jam games. 

If you happen to use this pack on a game you end up releasing, i would be delighted if you linked your project on the comments! I'm interested in seeing what people make with this!

Contains

This pack contains:

  • 24 Different meats and their cooked variations
  • 5 Different dairy products
  • 20 different foods made up of those mentioned above!
